mapper.insert: insert into users (email, password, name , nickname , phone, birthday, image, givenewpwA, givenewpwQ) values(#{email}, #{password}, #{name},#{nickname} ,#{phone} ,#{birthday},#{image} ,#{givenewpwA},#{givenewpwQ})
mapper.update: update users set nickname = #{nickname}, phone = #{phone}, givenewpwA =#{givenewpwA}, givenewpwQ = #{givenewpwQ} where email = #{email}
